articles.author: Emmanuel Felton
articles.title: What to know about California's reparations proposal for Black Americans - The Washington Post
articles.description: A California panel has recommended potentially billions of dollars in reparations for Black residents. The proposal would have to be approved by state lawmakers.
articles.content:
